tool_description: Cryptocurrency related news, coin information and more
title: Everything Crypto

api_list.name: getAllPolicyNews
api_list.description: Provides recent policy related news from all our available sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://everything-crypto.p.rapidapi.com/v1/policy/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "everything-crypto.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getOneNews
api_list.description: Provides news from only the selected source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://everything-crypto.p.rapidapi.com/v1/news/{source}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "everything-crypto.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getOneCryptoBySlug
api_list.description: Provides detailed information about a single cryptocurrency by the slug of the crypto

}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getCoinPricing
api_list.description: Retrieve coin pricing, market cap and volume for a specified timeframe and interval.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://everything-crypto.p.rapidapi.com/v1/crypto/pricing/{coin}/{timeframe}/{interval}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "everything-crypto.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
